backend/main.mo: Main Motoko canister defining user profiles, check-ins, invite code generation, RSVP handling, and access-controlled queries and updates.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profile structures to newer ones by removing deprecated fields while preserving actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping feature IDs to frontend files, components, and related tests for relationship status updates and settings controls.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend components, hooks, and configuration files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind layer defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode overrides, and base styles for the app.
frontend/index.html: Static HTML entry point that mounts the app and loads the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component handling authentication, profile setup, pairing flow, relationship status checks, and view navigation.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button providing login/logout with Internet Identity and clearing React Query cache on logout.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout wrapper showing flags, relationship status, branding, auth button, and page structure with header, main, and footer.
frontend/src/features/checkins/CheckInCo: UI for creating and submitting a check‑in with emoji and message, handling premium limits, submission states, and validation.
frontend/src/features/checkins/constants: Defines available emoji options for check‑ins and the maximum message length.
frontend/src/features/checkins/TodayStat: Displays today's check‑ins for the user and partner, including loading, latest entries, counts, and status indicators.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useCheckI: React Query hook that fetches historical check‑ins from the actor with a configurable limit.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useSubmit: Mutation hook for submitting a new check‑in and invalidating related queries on success.
frontend/src/features/checkins/useTodayC: React Query hook that retrieves today's check‑ins from the actor.
Builds and exports a sorted, deduplicated list of countries from the ISO dataset and provides lookup by code.
frontend/src/features/country/CountriesM: Country selection component with searchable popover list based on the COUNTRY dataset.
Converts a two‑letter ISO country code into its corresponding flag emoji.
frontend/src/features/country/iso3166Alp: Exports the full ISO‑3166‑1 alpha‑2 country code dataset used for country listings.
frontend/src/features/country/worldMapPa: Placeholder file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/CheckInH: Displays a user's recent check-in history with loading, empty, and list states.
frontend/src/features/dashboard/Dashboar: Main dashboard showing streaks, today's check-in tools, and history tabs.
frontend/src/features/emotionalmap/Emoti: Shows emotional comparison between partners based on today's check-ins with sync status.
frontend/src/features/pairing/PairingCar: UI for generating invite tokens and joining a partner via code with copy and error handling.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useDisconn: Mutation hook to disconnect partners and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useInviteT: Generates and stores an invite token using a mutation with error and loading states.
frontend/src/features/pairing/useJoinWit: Handles joining a partner via invite token and refreshes pairing-related queries.
frontend/src/features/pairing/usePairing: Fetches partner principal and profile, exposing pairing status and metadata.
frontend/src/features/profile/ProfileSet: Modal for entering or completing a user profile with name and country selection.
frontend/src/features/profile/useGetCall: Loads the current user's profile with actor-based querying and loading state.
frontend/src/features/profile/useHasPrem: Queries whether the current user has premium status.
frontend/src/features/profile/useSaveCal: Saves the user's profile with validation and invalidates profile queries on success.
frontend/src/features/relationshipStatus: UI control for viewing and updating the user’s relationship status with mutation handling and toast feedback.
Initial selection view allowing users to choose a relationship status and save it via mutation.
Maps relationship statuses to Tailwind color classes and provides a helper to fetch appropriate colors.
Defines the list and type of available relationship status options.
Query hook to load and expose the user's relationship status and loading states.
Mutation hook to update the user's relationship status and invalidate related queries.
frontend/src/features/settings/SettingsV: Settings page for managing country, relationship status, and partner disconnection with related mutation flows.
frontend/src/features/streak/StreakSecti: Displays the shared streak count with animation on increments when paired.
frontend/src/features/streak/useSharedSt: Query hook that retrieves the shared streak count from the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file noting that queries are organized by feature modules.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base file defining theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/lib/checkInHelpers.ts: Utility to get the latest check-in for a specific author.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that initializes React, QueryClient, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash-based), store them in sessionStorage, retrieve them later, and clear them from the URL or storage.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's state, feature descriptions, architectural notes, known issues, and existing functionality for a relationship app with Firebase backend.
